messages.subject: Grog...I mean, Dandelione Wine
messages.msgSnippet: Arr! It s Talk Like A Pirate Day, ye lubbers! hee hee and I ve had about four sips of our grog (which is the dandelion wine we put up in April) and wow! hee
messages.messageBody:
Arr! It's Talk Like A Pirate Day, ye lubbers! hee hee

and I've had about four sips of our "grog" (which is the dandelion
wine we put up in April) and wow! hee hee Not being much of a
drinker, this stuff is going to my head like anything! I've already
got the giggles hee hee

the stuff is STRONG...sweet, and very alcoholic! LOL I wonder how you
test the proof of a homemade wine ROFLOL arrrr

we were all going to have some...but the little kids better stay
away, methinks.

This'll be what we drink at Thanksgiving, for sure...hic

Blessings, heidiC
